DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe. The aim of this study is to investigate Long-Term Effectiveness of Liraglutide for Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes in daily Practice.
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Effectiveness of Liraglutide for Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes in Daily Practice
DOC.criteria: Subjects of age above 18 years as per VictozaÂ® SmPC par.4.2 and 5.1 diagnosed with type 2 diabetes receiving the first prescription of liraglutide in 2011 None. Available data from all eligible patients for each center, will be included
